attributes.action: promote the external display of their street number by all business premises.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Shops and other businesses that have the decency to display the street number of their premises are now in the minority.  The worst offenders are branches of chains, with their mass-produced shop fronts.  The result nationally must be a colossal waste of people's time, fuel and shoe leather.
